articles.description: Ananya Panday took to Instagram in order to reveal an important bit of information about Liger. Read on to see the post and find out what she has to say.
articles.content: Ananya Panday took to Instagram in order to reveal that in the coming few days, she will be unveiling the theatrical release date of the Vijay Deverakonda-starrer Liger. Prior to sharing that Liger's… [+2643 chars]

articles.title: "Hopefully Mr. McMahon picks me to be in it" - WWE legend wants to be in 2022 Royal Rumble match after 5-year hiatus - Sportskeeda
articles.description: WWE Hall of Famer D-Von Dudley has stated that he wants to be a part of next year's Royal Rumble match. The WWE legend said that he is trying to get back in shape after his recent health issue.
articles.content:
